explanation: [0-0] Two people are standing by the shelves in a supermarket. A man with black hair, wearing a black shirt and red shorts. There is also a blonde woman in a purple dress. The man in black throws a purple pillow in his hand at the woman in purple.
[0-2] Then the man in black throws another pillow at the woman in purple and turns around. The woman in purple turns around to look at the man in black after being hit.

At this time, a pumpkin falls from the air, the boy picks up the broken pumpkin on the ground after throwing the pillow.
